text: Me: What a stylish hat over there!
Me: My aunt had one of those and wore it every day.
Date: Aha... I really needed to know that about your aunt...
Date: I also like hats. But I like neckties more.
Date: I have a whole collection, hihi.
Me: You need to show it to me!
Me: What is your favorite motive?
Date: What the heck are you doing?!
Date: Hihi, I will show it to you!
Date: My favorite one is pink with yellow ducks, hihi.
